## Paginator class

Class for paging evaluation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Paginator 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [getCountdownOffset()](./common.paginator.getcountdownoffset.md) |  | Returns the absolute index of the first item on current page in countdown paging. |
|  [GetFirstPage()](./common.paginator.getfirstpage.md) |  |  |
|  [getIndexesPerPage()](./common.paginator.getindexesperpage.md) |  | Gets indexes for items on current page (zero-based indexes) |
|  [getItemCount()](./common.paginator.getitemcount.md) |  | Returns the total number of items. |
|  [getItemsPerPage()](./common.paginator.getitemsperpage.md) |  | Returns the number of items to display on a single page. |
|  [getLastPage()](./common.paginator.getlastpage.md) |  | Returns last page number. |
|  [getLength()](./common.paginator.getlength.md) |  | Returns the number of items on current page. |
|  [getOffset()](./common.paginator.getoffset.md) |  | Returns the absolute index of the first item on current page. |
|  [getPage()](./common.paginator.getpage.md) |  | Returns current page number. |
|  [getPageCount()](./common.paginator.getpagecount.md) |  | Returns the total number of pages. |
|  [getPageIndex()](./common.paginator.getpageindex.md) |  | Returns zero-based page number. |
|  [getPagesWithDispersion(dispersion)](./common.paginator.getpageswithdispersion.md) |  | Gets list of page numbers with specified dispersion |
|  [getPagesWithTrimDispersion(dispersion)](./common.paginator.getpageswithtrimdispersion.md) |  | Gets list of page numbers with specified dispersion, pages are trimmed if current page is near beginning or end |
|  [getPagesWithUniformDistribution(numberOfPages)](./common.paginator.getpageswithuniformdistribution.md) |  | Gets list of page numbers generated with uniform distribution |
|  [isFirst()](./common.paginator.isfirst.md) |  | Gets indication whether is the current page the first one? |
|  [isLast()](./common.paginator.islast.md) |  | Gets indication whether is the current page the last one? |

|  [setItemCount(itemCount)](./common.paginator.setitemcount.md) |  | Sets the total number of items. |
|  [setItemsPerPage(itemsPerPage)](./common.paginator.setitemsperpage.md) |  | Sets the number of items to display on a single page. |
